summary: They finish each other's sentences, dance like Fred and Ginger, and share the same downtown loft--the perfect couple? Not exactly. Gray and Sam, are a sister and brother so compatible and inseparable that people actually assume they are dating. Mortified, they both agree they must branch out and start searching for love. He'll look for a guy for her and she'll look for a gal for him.
cast: Heather Graham|Bridget Moynahan|Tom Cavanagh|Molly Shannon|Rachel Shelley|Bill Mondy|Don Ackerman|Warren Christie|Alan Cumming|Sissy Spacek|Campbell Lane|Samantha Ferris|Tim Perez|Benjamin Ratner|April Telek|Alejandro Abellan|Casey Dubois|Patti Allan|Gloria Gaynor|Dan Joffre|Checo Tohomaso|Nichole Paris|Chinwe Cusing|Lewis Williams|Kim Smith-Jensen|Marilyan Clements|Richard Ian Cox|Gillian Hutchison|Jack di Blasio|Emily Anne Graham|Kaaren de Zilva|Kathryn Kirkpatrick
keywords: new york city|f rated|lesbianism|reference to oprah winfrey|lesbian kiss
title: Los líos de Gray
